SRM Institute of Science and Technology

Kattankulathur, Tamil Nadu
A++NAAC accredited
SRMIST is one of India's top-ranked universities, with more than 52,000 full-time students and over 3,200 faculty members. It has state-of-the-art laboratories for engineering and technology students, as well as a medical college, hospital, and research center. SRMIST's College of Engineering and Technology collaborates with more than 50 universities and 215 corporations to strengthen its academic and research programs. In 2003, SRMIST established an International Advisory Board (IAB) made up of 31 distinguished deans, directors, and professors from top universities around the world.
